Description:
Stylishly renovated
Located in between the White Hills shops and Lake Weeroona, this lovely three bedroom home is minutes from all conveniences including shops, schools and the hospital. It has been recently renovated with beautiful taste which complements the original features and charm of the home.
Behind the secure front colourbond fence the solid home has been well maintained and is ready for the new owners to move in and enjoy. Upon entering from the porch through the double timber doors, the original features like decorative cornice and polished hard wood floors set the tone for the rest of the home. At the end of the hall you walk into the dining area where there is plenty of space for a family table. The old gas heater has been replaced by a gas log fire and there is a wall air conditioner to keep you comfortable all year round. This open plan means the kitchen and dining work well together, updated with stylish tiles, timber and classic white cupboards and bench tops. It has plenty of pantry space with a stainless steel Bosch dishwasher, electric oven and oversized five burner gas cook top. The lounge joins the dining area and is of a good size and has a large window facing the front of the house.
The main and second bedroom are sizeable and feature new carpet and blinds, ceiling fans and built in robes. The central bathroom has had some updates and a fresh coat of paint, featuring a new modern vanity, toilet and shower over bath. At the rear of the property is the vestibule/study area which has the third bedroom also freshly carpeted, second toilet and laundry joining with direct access to the single garage.
Only minutes drive to the centre of Bendigo and within walking distance of transport, shops, walking tracks and the lake this updated solid home is ready for it's new owners to move in and enjoy.
Insights: 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
The One You’ve Been Searching For!
Situated in the sought after Peppercorns Estate on a quiet street close to schools, Lake Weeroona, Bendigo Hospital and only minutes from the CBD is this great home offering the lot. From the light filled entry, the main bedroom has an ensuite with a large shower and walk in robe, while the other three bedrooms have built in mirrored robes all with ducted heating and cooling to keep you comfortable all year round. The kitchen is equipped with quality stainless steel appliances with plenty of bench space, cupboards, draws and a large caesar stone island bench. The free flowing open - plan design with 2570mm high ceilings offers a feeling of spacious and stylish living in comfort. The sliding door leads out to a huge 64 square metre private outdoor area that's perfect for entertaining and al fresco dining. Another great feature is the home theatre complete with 3.8m wide screen and 1080p HD Projector and surround sound. The low maintenance gardens are auto reticulated from the 4000 litre rainwater tank and feature a beautifull lawned yard. The home is well placed on a 705m2 block with ample parking, storage space for a boat or trailer and full side access to the 6m x 9m shed at the rear of the property for your caravan and workshop. Just move in and enjoy! Call 0418597918 to book inspection.

Address: 4/107 St Killian Street White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
Immaculate Investment
Set in a peaceful location is this low maintenance unit offering modern features throughout including; an open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher and plenty of cupboard space. The meals area leads directly out to the neat and tidy courtyard, which requires minimum up-keep. Internally there are two bedrooms, each with built in robes for storage. The centrally located and light filled bathroom comprises of a bath & separate toilet, there is also a generous laundry with internal access to the single lock up garage. Heating and cooling is also taken care of with a split system for year-round comfort.
This neat, tidy and spacious unit is a must to inspect! Investors will be delighted by the attractive returns of $250 per week in which the current tenants are paying whilst taking fantastic care of the property!
Situated less than 10 minutes from the Bendigo CBD this property is a fantastic find, all White Hills amenities are within walking distance, along with bus stops and the local primary school. Don't delay your inspection of this spotless unit, contact the agent today.

Address: 51-59 Church Street (cnr of Backhaus St) White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
Spacious Family Living in Peaceful and Tranquil Setting
This great family home is set on an allotment of 3 acres (1.2 hectares), zoned low density residential, and is located in very popular White Hills - a must to inspect for families, retirees and land developers.
Experience the complete package, with nothing to do but move in and relax.
This home is sure to impress and delight you from the moment you walk through the door.
Features include 5 large bedrooms, four with built-in robes, and the spacious main bedroom with a walk-in robe and views overlooking the tree lined landscape.
The two living areas include a large open-plan family hub with bar, gas heater and plenty of sunlight in the early mornings, while an ambient gas log fire for the winter months is a feature in the formal lounge, with beautiful views over the park-like gardens.
The renovated family-sized kitchen is equipped with dishwasher, gas and electric cooking and granite overlay bench tops.
Great storage, ducted evaporative cooling throughout and two bathrooms, one recently renovated.
Outside finds easily-maintained gardens and a 5kw solar system. There is plenty of room for the kids to play and explore, and the large fully fenced back yard will accommodate the family dog easily.
The custom fully tiled pool (56,000ltrs) is magnificent - salt chlorinated, solar heated, extremely private and with its own fountain.
The allotment allows access room for caravan, boats or trailers, plus there is a large shed with power, water, concrete floor and bar (7.5m x 12m x 4m high), ready for all the toys and hobbies. 45,000lts of tank water storage (2 tanks).
This great lifestyle opportunity is only a few minutes to Bendigo CBD, close to walking tracks, sporting facilities and schools, yet tucked away in a fantastic hide-away location with tranquil, peaceful surrounds, privacy and amazing views. There is an opportunity to sub-divide (STCA) or land bank for the future.
A rare opportunity to acquire a beautiful property and live in a world of your own. Inspect now!
Directions please enter off Backhaus Street, follow sign.
Insights: 51-59 Church Street (cnr of Backhaus St), White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2018.

Located just metres from first-class amenities in White Hills – including Schools, Shops, Lake Weeronna, and Bendigo Botanic Gardens White Hills and so much more – this fabulous three bedroom home is highly convenient. The home itself is comfortable, light-filled and low maintenance, three bedrooms master with ensuite, a living area and separate kitchen/meals as well as an attractive private courtyard. Add your own personal touches with a freshen up throughout to your liking. Great value, fantastic location, be quick to inspect.

- Brand new home well under construction - 2 Brm home with open plan living
- Local high quality builder G J Gardner - stainless steel appliances, ducted gas heating, split system
- Quality appliances and fittings, fully landscaped and fenced
- Boutique sub-division close to Botanic Gardens and Lake Weeroona
- Only minutes to Bendigo CBD and Epsom shopping centre
- First home buyers can apply for $20,000 first home buyer grant plus stamp duty savings
- Close to shops, public transport, Jockey club, health facilities, bowls club etc
- Quiet boutique court where families love to live
This two bedroom home is only minutes to the CBD. The home has been built by a highly regarded local builder and is almost complete. All of the hard work is underway, simply move in to your new home upon completion. New homes in this locale ready to take up occupancy are a rare find indeed. Ideal home for the investor, professional couple or retiree.

Description:
COMPLETE FAMILY HOME!
At only 12 months old, this family home is as-good-as-new and offers many upgrades throughout and is designed for both indoor and outdoor living!
Features master suite with generous walk-through robe leading to the spacious tiled ensuite with double vanity and oversized shower.
The remaining three robed bedrooms are all tucked away from the hustle and bustle along with the main bathroom with separate toilet.
Two living areas mean families can spread out in style or use one as a home theatre/playroom/study area while the light-filled open kitchen, meals and family living zones all overlook one of the multiple outdoor entertaining spaces.
The kitchen is a cook's delight with walk-in pantry and long Caesarstone-topped island bench with waterfall ends incorporating double-bowl sink, dishwasher, an ample supply of pot drawers 900mm range with five-burner gas cooktop and oversized fridge cavity.
Quality floor tiling, fuss-free dual window blinds and ducted heating/cooling throughout add to the comfort levels of this fine family home.
The fully-landscaped block features lush lawn at the back overlooked by a large entertainer's deck. The double garage has direct personal access to the residence and remote door.
Why build from scratch when you could have this ready-made, big, bold and beautifully finished family home? There's absolutely nothing to do but move in and enjoy new standards of living. Located in popular White Hills with walkway connecting to White Hills primary the street across and only minutes to Lake Weeroona and the Bendigo CBD

Description:
A Tranquil Heaven
I know first-hand how popular & sought-after courts are, however this one has a hidden treasure right in the heart of it.
Having been transformed over the years into a 10 out of 10 from its initial blank canvas into what is now a private tranquil heaven
Our proud owners have managed to pull off the impossible, creating an air of character about the property at every moment of the day, mornings, afternoons and evenings this beautifully refined home sparkles with ambience
Huge amounts of foresight planning time, money, passion and energy have gone into creating every detail in and out of this luxury adobe
A major factor in all this is the homes Chee, an ebb and flow achieved mainly from the layout that seamlessly allows the owners to enjoy every aspect of the property both inside and out all the time and all at once
The timber decked patio area is located off both the Master bedroom and main living areas providing all year-round relaxation and endless entertainment opportunities
This home is just jam packed with upgraded additions where our owners have spared no expense, here are just a few:
workshop (5m x 4m)
patterned concrete
3kw solar panels & inverter
metal gutter guard around entire house
clear blinds in alfresco
garden sheds (x2)
shed for timber & bikes, & metal racks – behind workshop
beautifully landscaped lawns, gardens and plantings (Incl. irrigation systems)
Veranda on west side
Shifted grey fencing & gates on west side
Auto floodlights on west side
Feature fish pond in front garden
There is nothing like knowing what it’s like to live in a home and the people who know this better than anyone is the owners themselves,
Here is just a small snapshot of what’s is in store for the new owners;
Nature reserve along west side
Birds in nature reserve
Beautiful sunsets
Quietness & privacy
Gas log fire heating in lounge
Plenty of space in kitchen and dining areas
Comfy, homely alfresco
Good neighbours
Close to CBD, but not too close
Close to Bendigo Creek cycling/walking paths
Close to Botanical Gardens & Lake Weeroona
Close to Aldi, Woolworths, Post Office & Chemist
Ducted heating & cooling
If you have been searching for something special, something unique, this property will win your heart.
With its two distinct living areas, an amazingly huge open kitchen, dining and living area then its separate lounge incorporating a cozy gas log fireplace, evaporative cooling, ducted heating providing all year-round comfort
Three Spacious bedrooms in all, Master with WIR & full ensuite, other 2 bedrooms have BIRs and close access to the main 3-piece bathroom
Convenient side access from both boundaries is offered from the property with room for the tailor & caravan and the beautifully presented secure garden & grassed yard area is ideal for the pets and kids to enjoy.
Inspection folks is a MUST !! Call Now

Description:
PLENTY OF POTENTIAL CLOSE TO LAKE WEEROONA
Only your imagination will limit you with this solidly built 1960s
weatherboard home. With many original features including floorboards
under carpet, decorative cornice and a fabulous retro kitchen, there is
great potential to be found.
To the right of the main entry hallway is a lounge room that wraps
around to a dining room and original kitchen. A gas fire and air
conditioner keep the space comfortable, and large windows on both
sides let in plenty of light.
The main hall leads through to the backdoor and off to the left down to a
bathroom with large tub and vanity and three good-sized bedrooms. The
sizeable master bedroom is large enough – and in the ideal location – to
create an ensuite and walk-in robe if required, and the master and one
of the other bedrooms enjoys a huge built-in wardrobe and vanity.
Before heading out the rear of the property, the laundry completes the
design in the main house. This spacious room includes a separate toilet
and a shower.
Outdoors, a ramp provides easy access to the backyard and a large
external room is ideal for a variety of uses including a fourth bedroom,
second living area, home office or granny flat.
The backyard features establishing planting and trees, and is sectioned
off at the rear providing a dog run, chook pen or vegetable patch if
needed. The long concrete driveway runs down the length of the block to
a secure single garage at the rear.
Additional features include:
- Sizable rear garden
- Four-burner gas cooktop and oven
- Great storage options including a large linen cupboard
Around the corner from both childcare and a high school and down the
road from Lake Weeroona, this lovely house is also just minutes from
Bendigo’s CBD. This neat property offers plenty of potential – fantastic
rental opportunities; the perfect starter home for a young family or as a
great project to create a business from home.

Description:
Spacious Family Living
This outstanding, quality family home is set on an allotment of 1668m2, in beautiful White Hills - a must to inspect for families.
Experience the complete package, with nothing to do but move in and relax.
This home is sure to impress and delight you from the moment you walk through the front door.
Featuring 3 living areas and 4 large bedrooms, the spacious main bedroom boasting a walk-in robe and light-filled ensuite, with all other bedrooms having built-in robes.
Forming part of a large, open plan living hub, the family-sized kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, gas cooking, and is adjacent to the family and dining area.
This space is perfect for entertaining, with access through a sliding door out to the undercover alfresco.
The home also has a rumpus room/study or home office.
A separate formal lounge for quiet entertaining can be found at the front of the home, and there's a separate area downstairs to get away.
This ensures every family member is well catered for.
Ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling takes care of year-round comfort, plus there is a ducted vacuum system, 2 toilets upstairs and one downstairs in the double garage.
Outside finds impressive landscaped, easily maintained gardens, while the huge alfresco area with blinds makes entertaining a breeze.
Side access allows room for caravan, boats or trailers.
A large 9m x 7m shed with power and concrete floor is ready for all the toys.
5000ltr water tank and a 2kw solar system for power saving.
This home is close to everything, yet you'd never know it from its tranquil and peaceful surrounds.
A fantastic location, in a wonderful community and a great lifestyle, only minutes to shops, White Hills Primary School, Creche and sporting facilities. Inspect now!
